definitions.definition: A (usually rigid ), flat , rectangular measuring or drawing device with graduations in units of measurement ; a straightedge with markings .
A person who rules or governs ; someone or something that exercises dominion or controlling power over others.

main_definition: A (usually rigid ), flat , rectangular measuring or drawing device with graduations in units of measurement ; a straightedge with markings .
secondary_definitions: A person who rules or governs ; someone or something that exercises dominion or controlling power over others.
